attributes.action: Extension of passed theory tests over the covid period
attributes.additional_details: Becuse i myself have missed out on 4-5months of driving or tests and this is not my fault and the fact they will not extend the passed tests is criminal just wanting more money and it has created fear and backlog theory tests are now booked up for a year in places like glasgow because of this
attributes.background: Get the government to force DVLSA to extend passed theory tests over the covid months thats we where not allowed to do lessons or sit tests
